sys_script_client.description: Create a client script on the maintenance table that will work on both the platform UI and service portal. This client script should run any time the assigned_to field changes. It should use AJAX to run a script on the server that will calculate how many maintenance tasks are already assigned to that same user and then display a message showing "The selected assignee already has ## maintenance tasks assigned to them".
sys_script_client.name: Calculate
